keywords:
line1: инфляц + “ в росс”
line2: инфляц + запад,европ,сша,штат,герм, ес,^ес
description: The graph depicts the frequency of headlines mention in relevant Russian-language media. It uses regex expressions for requesting the words "inflation" + "in Russia", "inflation" + "West", "Europe", "USA" in the Tableau worksheet. Timeframe: 01.01.2022 - 31.07.2022. Data source: GDELT.
chart_title: Frequency of headlines mentioning inflation in Russia and inflation in the world in Russian media.
name: sanctions-tableau-inflation
